Side Effects: Stopped taking Arava after 2 weeks. I have not been able to control the diarrhea since stopping this drug. Lomotil has only helped a little bit. Wish I had never taken this drug. I've had diarrhea for 3 weeks now My doctor prescribed this because I had swelling on ONE finger joint. It is a very aggressive drug. I would advise not taking it.
I'm good with Arava. It's the cost of it lately that has caused me not to take it everyday_ so my soreness could be due to that or just because I have RA.
Didn't notice any side effects
Comments: Was bedridden for months when first diagnosed with ra. Plaque nil was useless and methotrexate caused severe nausea. Very happy with arava results but now I've stopped due to concerns with messed up immune system

Side Effects: diarrhea and stomach pains
Comments: I took ARAVA prescribed by my rheumatologist after taking for over 2 months methrotaxate which was awful with bad side effects. Then after starting ARAVA more side effects and I stopped. But it's been over 2 months and I am still getting the runs_ I mean diarrhea and often accompanied by stomach pains.

Side Effects: major hair loss but worse it trashed my liver. Ended up in the hospital with doctor talking about a liver transplant if things didn't get better. Luckily it has started to heal but I have to take another drug to flush this stuff out of my system. I can't afford these bills.

Just felt strange on this medicine felt like I was gonna pass out 2 mornings in a row felt very tired couldn't sleep I stopped taking it don't want to take this med anymore not worth the side effects.

Initially no side effects though it did take a long time to start working. In September_ I had a flare - right knee and right pointer toe (sausage toe - excruciatingly painful). The toe calmed down after 24 hours but the knee was not helped in any way_ I had to get a steroid shot in it in December. Also in September_ my toes first_ and then the rest of the feet_ started a tingling/burning sensation and some numbness. I couldn't even touch them. By mid-December_ I was done - informed the doc of the foot issue when I got the knee shot. So I'm done taking leflunomide and back to methotrexate (which I quit before because it makes me so tired).

6 hours after taking the very first 10mg tablet_ I was trembling to the point my teeth were chattering and I was feeling very unwell. Ambulance was called and all vitals were out of wack so off to emergency. Released when stabilizedafter 6 hours in emergency. 5 hours later I was shaking worse_ was uncoordinated and unresponsive to next ambo team. This time I was hospitalized 2 days till everything stabilized.  Extensive tests determined no infection but a side effect stated as "flue like symptons!"
Comments: Cannot beleive they suggest 3 days on 100mg then 10mg after that. Specialist started me on 10mg thank goodness_  else I'd  probably  be  dead now!! I certainly will NOT be taking Arava  anymore!

Side Effects: I have been taking Arava going on four months now.  I noticed immediately the change in bowel habits.  I like this however due to how severely constipated I usually am.  I actually feel like I go like a noreal person now.  I'm starting to notice a bit of hairloss.  Not a lot but concerned it could get worse.  Im curious of anyones experience with the hairloss part of it.  No other side effects so far.  I still have joint pain.
NauseaÌ€_ tiredness_ anorexia. Too unfortunate Better ra_ less pain_ greater mobility_ less wheezing. Second go round. First time lasted 1 year until severe nausea and hair loss.
Comments: Orencia... severe pneumonia_ prednisone... loss of cartilage_ flattening of breasts_ wrinkling of face_ general loss of feminine attributes.0

Side Effects: Intermittent diarrhea - sometimes mild_ sometimes severe.  The other 2/3 of the time no problems.  No hair loss. Mild appetite suppression. No itching. No rash.  Labs are normal so far.  I have a nasty cold right now that doesn't seem to want to go away - no one else is sick in my house. Not sure if it's a coincidence or from the arava suppressing my immune system.
Comments: I have been on Plaquenil_ stopped due to unrelenting itching. Methotrexate oral and SQ_ stopped due to extreme fatigue and nausea. Imuran_ stopped due to allergic reaction sudden onset fever_ nephritis_ elevated LFTs.  Cyclosporine_ stopped due to angioedema_ rash_ itching.  Humira_ no side effects but developed large lymph nodes and was concerned. Prednisone_ I limit taking due to already having osteopenia from use. So far on Arava I'm no longer fatigued.  Joint swelling and stiffness is much improved. Have had two small flares in a two month period but seem to be self limiting. I've been able to more consistently exercise- walk dogs_ walk on treadmill_ ride horse. Able to more reliably do things around house and yard. Generally feeling more energetic and not so run down from being sore all the time. I actually have days when I don't even think about my RA now. It's been a couple years since I could say that.

Side Effects: Some mild diarrhea
Comments: I was in so much pain prior. Uric acid and inflammation levels off the scale. Was taking Tramadol 3x day as I had prior kidney cancer and cannot take NSAIDs. I'm feeling so much better. Walking 25 miles a week now when before I could hardly exercise. No hair loss- I'm curious as to how long others experienced this and how severe?

Side Effects: Nausea_ chest pain_ considerable hair loss
Comments: Arava did help with the RA pain and inflammation but the side effects were not worth it.  Going through the washout now and hoping the hair loss will subside soon.

Side Effects: I have been on this drug for a week do you get side affects straight away or can it take a few weeks to kick in .. ive heard it can take a good few weeks before you can get any side affects

Horrible sun sensitivity. To the point my skin hurt after mowing and ended up with little red raised itchy spots all over. I never put 2 and 2 together_ but I have also had the diarrhea others have mentioned for the last 2 years. In the last 2 months_ my joint and muscles have not felt as good and I have had absolutely HORRIFIC hair loss. Lose much more and I will have to get a pixie cut and look like I have mange it is so bad. I emailed my doctor today and told him I'm not taking it anymore. Honestly_ I felt better taking just plaquenil and prednisone for years. Disgusted at rheumatologic therapies. Maybe it wasn't such a good idea to post today. Just keeping it real.
Loss of taste and smell diarehha but didn't start until about 6 weeks after starting medication

When I  mentioned to my rheumatologist about the annoying diarrhea_ she immediately said_ "Oh!  That's dosage related!  We can fix that!"  She dropped me from 20 mg. to 10 mg. and I have been fine ever since.  NO dreadful side effects at all!  I did have a mild rash for three months that the cause remained undetermined_ but that cleared up on it's own.
Comments: Working GREAT!  No issues!

Side Effects: WHOLE BODY HAS RED SPOTS AFTER A GASTROINTESTINAL REACTION_MOUTH ULCERS._URINE INFECTION
Comments: I AM VERY AFRAID TO TAKE THIS MEDICATION ANYMORE BECAUSE I CANNOT ACCEPT THIS SIDE EFFECTS

Side Effects: It's been years since I've taken this med so I started taking it at night because it use to make me really nauseated. I'm wondering if I should continue taking it at night or in the morning to get its full effec.

I started with 10 mg per day_ suffered 2 bouts of bronchitis_ asthma was worse.  After 2 mos. Rheumatologist decided to up dose to 20mg per day. PA pain under control and felt great for 21 days. Then acute diarrhea.  I couldn't leave the house.  Urgent care doctor put me on 2 doses of strong antibiotics no relief. I finally made the connection with arava/leflunamide. I have been advised to stop taking it.  That was yesterday.  Diarrhea is still acute.  Hope it ends soon.
Comments: I wish I had known more about the side effects. I also experienced brain fog_ nausea and gastrointestinal distress.

Side Effects: Took 5 pills First  morning_ then 1 a day for 2 days. Though I was going to have a seizure or something_ felt like I was trembling all over_ couldn't sleep and felt edgy. Called doc_ she did't think it was the med_ but take a break & try again. Next week_ started with one pill_ by end of 3 rd day trembling started again...glad I didn't take the bigger dose. Stopped pills again_ feeling gone after 24 hours.
Comments: Really wanted this to work but the way I felt was scary

Side Effects: Hair loss started right away.  And chest pains and blood pressure was very high.  My rheumatologist never told me about the bad side affects.  Make sure you know how bad you can feel on this medication.  I finally went off of it when I was getting very sharp pains in my chest like I was being stabbed.  My blood pressure was high.  My primary care physician told me to get off of the drug because of the high blood pressure and chest pains.  My rheumatologist said my hair loss would stop when I stopped taking the leflunomide and I should see a dermatologist if my hair loss was still a problem.  He sure is not very knowledgeable about it staying in your system for up to 2 years.  Got  a new rheumatologist.  He said it does stay in your system up to 2 years.  You have to be your own advocate for your health.
mild hair loss_ mild diarrhea_ tingling and numbness in toes_ fatigue
Comments: Am taking in combination with Plaquenil. Has made a huge difference in my life. Pain under control day to day with only occasional flares. Am finally able to walk normally and use my hands. Occasional trouble sleeping_ however this problem is better on Arava than off it with severe pain. Am grateful this was offered to me.

I got off all drugs and apple cider vinegar worked for 3 years. After a flare up nothing worked for long and I had to change my diet; no white rice or bread. I find the best treatment is physical therapy with cold and hot water bathing and some rub on creams with arthritic gloves for the night. It takes time as you have to teach the body not to attack itself when sleeping (the autoimmune).

Side Effects: headache_ nausea_ loss of appetite (but not worth death) sweating profusely as in sopping wet on my clothes sheets_ extreme weakness in legs and feet_ chest pain_ vision_ confusion or just blah brain_  worsening of dry eyes_ nose and mouth_ dizziness_ sleepiness and also sleeplessness_ over all feeling of severe side effects started on 4th day of taking the medication.  Took for 3 more days and then just had to stop it.  After 3 days off side effects are going away and first noticable was sweating and headache thank god.
Comments: I have been on just about everything and methatrexate started to make me feel sicker then usual after 12 yrs on it.  Very strange that I started to suffer all of the worse side effects after so long.  So then the PA said_ OH LETS try Arava_ wihtout telling me anything about these horrible side effects I now read about.  This is insane to take this medication as I have felt I was dying and I still do not feel well at all.  I am still on Humera but now hesitate to take this weeks dosage.  Anyone is free to contact me about this drug or any other RA information.  Do I have to take that other drug to get 7 days of Arava out of my system???

Side Effects: severe hair loss_ cysts/cystic acne_ headaches_ high blood pressure_ rash_ itching_ chronic yeast infection
Comments: I started on the 10 mg dose and was fine_ increased to 20 mg after a month and my hair was coming out by the hand fulls.  Headaches and cysts in my face followed.  I literally have a small hole in my cheek one was so deep.  I had bug bites on my legs that grew into what looked like eczema and needed a week or two of rx hydrocortisone to heal.  I had a chronic yeast infection-not sure if related_ that took numerous OTC treatments_ diflucan and finally resorted to coconut oil to control it.  I stopped the drug and my hair continues to fall out_ and now I am starting to itch all over and am nauseous with cramping.  I plan to do the wash out-not sure what is worse the side effects_ especially the hair loss_ or the stress from all this. I have lost at least half the hair on my head_ and it is to the point that I am afraid to brush my hair as I blow dry it as it pulls so much out. This is emotionally devastating.

Side Effects: Got verry ill i got confused memory loss tingling left side went numb frequent urine vomiting severe stomach ache light color stools insomnia and my daughter thought i had a stroke it cause neurological problems stroke symptoms i fell out while at the store this medication almost killed me  i wouldnt wish tht  on anyone the ra meds they have are dangerous i have tried methotrexate  embriel amd now this make sure if ur gonna take tgis medicine do research first they were gonna do surgery cause thwy thought i was suffeeing from gallbladder problems

I took this approximately ten hours ago for the first time ever.  I immediately felt nauseous which subsided somewhat after eating.  I then began feeling anxious for some reason and then came the nonstop itching.  I can't seem to stop.  My throat itches_ my neck itches_ my scalp itches_ my torso itches.  I should have been to sleep three hours ago_ and have had no relief from the itching two hours post-benadryl.   I hate this drug. I can't imagine what it is doing to my organs.
Comments: I was diagnosed with RA a year ago.  Fortunately_ I worked at my job for 21 years and received STD and LTD until my SSD was approved.  What a ride.  I have tried methotrexate_ Plaquenil_ prednisone_ Humira.  The drugs for this disease have caused me to be so sick at times I thought I would die.  The worst was the methotrexate cough that turned into bronchitis.  I literally laid in bed for five weeks taking monstrous antibiotics which seemed to make me more sick.  I have a bad feeling about this Arava and will be calling my rheumatologist in the morning to report the annoying itching and anxiousness.  This drug isn't for me.

Side Effects: lethargy_ severe hair loss that has not abated.
Comments: what a nightmare! I stopped the drug a month ago and my hair's still coming out in clumps (even though I've been taking 10mg biotin_ 3mg folic acid_ and using Rogaine every day). I started the cholestyramine wash-out a few days ago. Still losing hair in clumps_ worried about bald spots on otherwise waist length hair. Arava made me lethargic_ the cholestyramine's not slowing the hair loss yet_ but it's making me sick and I'm missing work because of this. Horrifying experience.

Side Effects: I have thinning hair_ bouts of diarrhea_ and weight loss.

It worked great for 2 years_ and all of a sudden_ it's quit working. I wake up with terriblebpain and headaches and nausea every day. I'm sorry to have to say this_ but I don't even have the strength to wipe after going to the bathroom. I don't understand why it worked for 2 years and then just quit?

In the past 14mos. of being on Arava I have experienced severe weight loss_ thinning of hair_ diarrhea_ occasional sores that do not heal quickly and occasional feelings of tiredness_ headaches & body aches.

I've only been on Arava for 6-7 days_ so hard to tell if it will work yet or not. First day_ I took right before bed. Made my asthma active. Since_ I've been taking around 1pm & that hasn't happened again. Side effects now are mainly just worsened aching and sharp pains in my joints_ hands especially. I'm hoping the weight loss side effect will kick in. I could stand to lose about 5-10 lbs!  :)
frequent nausea and diarrhea
Comments: So far_ I have not seen the RA get better with leflunomide but it has not gotten worse either. The nausea is really hard to deal with_ however_ and I wonder if it is self-limiting.

Side Effects: Feverish feeling_ fatique_ sore eyes_ blurriness_ light sensitivity_  slight itchy rash
Doing great. Helped so much!!!
Minimal hair loss_ fatigue_ muscle weakness_ blurry vision_ persistant cough_ involuntary muscle spasms_ loose stools_ memory loss.

Reason: exhausted all other RA meds eccept
Side Effects: Diarrhea Many Times a day& frequent urination

I have been feeling nauseous a few hrs after taking the pill and will then throw up. I am always feeling itchy but there is never any rash. I get terrible headaches that can last almost all day. I also have been needing to constantly pee and have stomach cramps and occasionally chest pain.

The worst side effect has been the hair loss.  My Dr. put me on 1 mg of folic acid to help stop the hair loss_ which seemed to help for a short time and then the hair started falling out again. I actually have a spot that has stopped growing. And_ just recently my arthritis symptoms came back.  My Dr. wanted to up my dose_ but I decided to get off of it.  I am now taking 2 mg folic acid and 10 mg Biotin_ I hope this works to get my hair back..

Horrible drug. Very harsh and irritating to my body. Got over the stomach issues that happened first_ but got severe headaches all the time. The pain from inflammation and join pains got worse. I got off the drug after six days because I feared for my life. Felt like I was going to have a stroke. My PCP said that Arava made the inflammation in my sinuses worse and probably made vascular inflammation worse. Got off it asap.
Comments: I understand the drug stays in your system for two entire years. One has to take another horrible drug with side effects to 'wash out' the Arava. Never will touch this poison again. It's not worth it.

Side Effects: Arava has worked wonders in my life and I'm almost symptom free of joint pain_ swelling and fatigue_ BUT I'M LITERALLY ALMOST BALD AND IT DEPRESSES ME!
Hair loss!
Comments: Arava has significantly helped my arthritis and general well being. The down side is that I've had EXTREME hair loss. I'm trying various remedies_ including high dose Biotin (10mg). I hope it works. I'm seriously considering going off of it. I'm on plaquenil as well and failed methotrexate.

Side Effects: Big toenails PAIN w/horizontal indentation_ dry itchy skin w/tingles/paleness_ painful loose bowels 1st month everyday_ moderate/severe head hair loss/GRAYING/brittleness_ existing tinnitus Worse_ dry nose/mild bleeding_ existing calf/ankle/foot edema Worse_ existing brain fog Worse
Comments: Lessened knee_ hand_ shoulder_ arm joint pain for about 2 weeks_ after 1 month_ then increased somewhat. All over unwell feeling returned. I sometimes don't know if it's worth it.

Side Effects: I've been itchy and had a little gastrointestinal distress but has been manageable
Comments: Starting to see a glimmer of my old self.  Moving more and a bit easier.  Woke up feeling rested for the first time on years.  I'm hopeful that this will be a good fit.  There seems to be light at the end of the tunnel and for a change it's not a train.

Side Effects: I was excited over the weight loss as I need to lose a lot. However_ after losing 61 lbs. I have now started to gain rapidly (over 5 lbs. in one week). I am so bummed because I do not want to gain it all back.It seems to have lowered my sed rate. I have also lowered my prednisone but since prednisone actually helps me LOSE weight and feel so much better I don't see that as a good thing. Prednisone has always been my friend. I am not sure now about the Arava.
Comments: So far my liver functions are normal. Plaquinil did nothing for me. Arava seems to help.

Side Effects: Hair loss_ decreased appetite_ weight loss_ diarrhea_ abdominal pain_ ITCHING(!!!)_ pneumonia.
Comments: I started Arava for psoriatic arthritis towards the middle-end of April.  Initially the side effects seemed to be tolerable...weight loss and mild diarrhea.  Recently I came down with a chest infection that turned into pneumonia.  I ended up in the hospital on IV antibiotics for 6 days.  I have since resumed the Arava_ and now I am noticing quite a bit of hair loss.  Most recently_ I have discovered that it is making me very itchy.  I have stopped it and restarted it twice_ due to the pneumonia.  Each time I restart it_ within a few days_ I become very itchy again.  It is literally from head to toe_ but there is no rash that I can see.  I was previously on MTX_ which was helping_ but I was diagnosed with liver disease and am unable to take MTX at this point in time.  However_ given these new side effects_ I may talk to my rheumatologist about switching back to MTX.  I am also unable to take biologics at this point in time_ due to a rare Remicade reaction.

Side Effects: Dizziness in the morning upon waking is my only complaint so far. It only last for 2 hours and goes away. But so far my joints hurt less and I have more energy! I am super excited about the changes so far and I have only been taking it a few days. Hopefully I only get better.
Texture change in hair_ minimal hair loss.
Comments: Arava was a life saver to me! I have more energy and my joint pain and swelling has lessened. I am starting to see glimpses of my old self coming through after 5 years of trying everything from Imuran to Plaquenil.  It took me about a month before I noticed a difference.

Side Effects: no side effects _ works brilliantly for me.
Loosing my hair
Hair loss_ fatigue

Loose stools_ bad stomach cramps_ badly blurred vision_ fatigue_ nausea.I ended up in ER over holidays. Thought it was influenza but it was Arava and it was awful. Stopped med for 3 weeks and started again to be sure...it is the Arava.  It works wonders for the RA but I lost three jean sizes in 3 weeks from the side effects...too sick to eat.
Considerable fatigue_ constant dry mouth/eyes/skin_ tingling in feet/fingers_ some hair loss. Extreme joint pain/swelling/immobility and muscle achiness.
Comments: RA Dr. doubled my dose yesterday to 20 mg a day_ because I haven't had any relief from the 10mg daily dose.After reading everyone's experiences here_ I'm a little nervous as to the worsening side effects. Sure hope this helps because I don't want to go on Biologics.

Side Effects: no side effects at all
loose stools_ nausea_ blurred vision_ tingling/numbness in feet/arms/face
Comments: I had no side effects with humira and mtx but after my baby was born_ they weren't as effective.  Changed to Actemra and MTX but rheumatologist was still not happy with results so replaced MTX with leflunomide.  Worked wonders for my RA but the side effects negated the positives. Took cholestyramine to flush leflunomide out of my system 2 weeks ago but still recovering.  Going back to MTX pills.

Side Effects: It makes me a little sleepy so i take it at night.  No other side effects so far.  This drug has made all the difference for me.
Comments: I was taking a combination of MTX and Humira.  The MTX left me in a constant state of nausea. Now on Humira and Arava and I feel like a new person.  Out of all my symptoms the fatigue was the most debilitating. With Arava I have more energy_ almost no stiffness and joint pain is minimal.  I feel normal. :) I hope it continues to work for me.

Side Effects: Bad diarrhea for a day yesterday_ but it hasn't helped feet pain so far
Comments: Was taking MTX for 5-6 years_ but liver played up_ so rheumatologist has switched me to Arava. Feet very painful still - I wonder if that will subside...

Side Effects: Initially_ I experienced reduction in the severity and length of flair-ups with the help of steroids.  After 6 months_ hair started falling out in handfuls_ numbness in balls of feet and toes_ rash under the arms. Also_ weight gain from intermittent steroid use. Dermatologist cured rash_ Rheumatologist recommended folic acid for hair loss (taking 2400 MCG per day to stop hair loss).  Still have numbness in feet that is tolerable.  Blood sugar has slowly creeped up along with cholesterol and am borderline diabetic. I moderate diet by almost eliminating red meat and sugar.  Eating more salmon and chicken and eliminating wheat helps. I also take ibuprofen and Hydrochlorothiazide 25 mg when i sense the occasional flair-up coming to reduce symptoms.  If the flair is severe_ I have to add a dose of steroids_ too.
Comments: Early on_ my rheumatologist recommended a dose of MTX with Arava.  I could not tolerate it_ so have managed to moderate my RA for years with Arava only.  I go through spurts of fair ups and then nothing for months.  I guess you could call me lucky that I don't experience some of the more drastic counter interactions of this drug.  I wish i could be off of Arava indefinitely but am glad that it has brought my symptoms somewhat under control. I am investigating taking an Indian homeopathic called Zyflamend recommended by a doctor to reduce inflammation. Have not tried this yet.

Side Effects: Loose stools but knee now much better. Started Avara after 12 years on methotrexate_ this used to knock me for six once a week and had ceased to be affective.
Comments: So far so good_ 3 weeks without metho and 3 weeks on Avara. Swelling has gone in knee_ aided by gym/physio exercise. Bloods all cleat_ exercise has kept blood pressure in the right range_ even managed to walk and play 18 holes of Golf for the first time in 4 months... fingers crossed it keeps working...

Side Effects: After MTX respratory problems_ Enbrel severe reaction_ no effects with Orencia after 9 months (even though tolerable)_3 weeks on Arava_ i am exhausted and the last three days have had heart palpitations and increased blood pressure (this am 160/100)_ cough like i had on MTX - not looking good
I just recently started the med. Stomach tore up bad and cramping daily. Irritability. So far I have increased pain.. in areas where I wasn't before. Will check back often.

Fatigue (more like complete exhaustion)_ shortness of breath_ heart palpitations_ persistant cough_ hair loss (hair down to my waist. I had to cut it up to my shoulders. It was coming out in handfuls)

None! My dose was increased to 20mg 4days & 40mg 3 days/week_ alternating. I had great results after few months_ with the severity & frequency of flares decreasing. Still had a few bad ones_ though_ so added the additional tab about 6 weeks ago. NO FLARES!!! I also take Plaquinil. Didn't want to take MTX & love my Rheumatologist for trying Arava!!
burning sensation hands & feet . Head aches .ulcr type rash

SO FAR_ I have had NO Diarrhea!!! No Hair Loss. BUT_ had lost a whole Head of Hair on MTHX. I have Headaches and Ringing in my Ears_ a little Stomach Pains_ Tolerable Nausea_ ON Arava.  Arava Seems to be Helping so far. I had NOT had any Set Backs in this Short time. I Can Tolerate this Pill as Opposed to Methotrexate @ .06ml Injections (Which I did MySELF!) On Methx I Couldn't Keep Loosing Hair cause I was Near BALD. The Nausea was Horrible and the FATIGUE was WORSE! I was Drinking Tons of Coffee to Stay Awake and taking Sleep Pills to Fall Asleep_ I was EXCELLENT in Reducing My Masses on my Lungs. It Arava Doesn't continue to work then Back on the Mthx;(  ~ Jan
Comments: I am Taking ARAVA for SARCOIDOSIS. I was Diagn in 09_ But Im Sure Ive had it for YEARS. My health(Fatigue_ Breathing) became worse_ and this is what they found_ Masses in My Lungs.  It has Now Spread to My Nose_ Fingers and Arms... Hope this was Helpful!  Jan

Side Effects: loose stools on occasion_ burning/tingling feet
Comments: My symptoms were quickly treated by Prednisone while I waited for Arava to kick in.  I was on Arava and Sulfasalazine for a year then just Arava for the last six months.  I believe my loose stools are connected to the Arava and the burning/tingling feet.  I will never know if my arthritis was kept away by the Arava or just b/c I'm in b/w flairs.  Either way my experience with Arava was positive for the most part.  I hardly felt like I was on any med at all.  The loose stools and burning feet symptoms were infrequent and were tolerable.  I think the Arava also helped clear up some eczema on my scalp.  My liver checks were always clear.

Side Effects: Started Arava 10 mg daily "test" dose late 2/2012 w/out obvious incident after a MISERABLE failure of methotrexate. Dose increased to Arava 20 mg daily 3/1/2012 w/immediate improvement in pain_ fatigue BUT ALSO SIDE EFFECTS. These started w/ SEVERE BLURRED VISION_ BURNING SOLES OF FEET_ SEVERE BRUISING_ RECTAL BLEEDING_ NEW ONSET SUPRAVENTRICULAR TACHYCARDIA (SVT) REQUIRING HEART TO BE "STOPPED"/"RESET" IN E.R._ NEW ONSET ANGINA.  *I* am a Physician Assistant and know in my gut that this IS due to the drug as I have normal cholesterol_ hormal blood pressure and no risk factors for heart disease other than family history. Was initially thrilled to be painfree for the first time in over a decade but AFTER READING THESE POSTS (FOUND AFTER MY HEART EPISODE) REALIZE THAT THE RISK:BENEFIT PROFILE IS **NOT** WORTH TAKING THIS MED.
Comments: Did Arava 10 mg "test" dose X 15 days_ then was on 20 mg X 15 days before heart went into SVT and had to be stopped to "reset" in addition to multiple other side effects.

Side Effects: Just gathering data. Not taking it yet. Want to know what I'm doing. I have my rx on my nightstand_ but I'm afraid.

I am a Senior Nurse Educator_ so I know what I am talking about_ and Arava almost killed me. I started taking it Oct 4_ 2011_ and by October 31_ I was admitted through the Emergency with DKA_ and I had never had diabetes in my life. My blood sigars were uncontrollable_ I had nausea and vomitting_ and diarhea the whole time I was taking the medicine. All food tasted strange with a horrible after taste ( when I could eat a bite). My Amylase_ and ALT were extrememly high as was my Creatinine. They though I would need dialysis. I had a UTI_ and uncontrollable blood sugars when I was admitted. I had problems with feet_ numbness and tingling_ and massive echymosis from any blood draw. I have a cough that makes me pee my pants even 2 months later. I will be diabetic_ and take insulin the rest of my life_ had foggy brain_ and even forgot words at times. I almost died in the hospital where I was admitted for 10 days while they tried to get my body back to normal. It did work on my RA pain_ but

I went to see my RA doctor and she was out_ her PA was there and told me she was starting me with Arava  She told me that if I had diarrhea_ not to stop taking Arava because after one month the diarrhea would eventually go away.  I followed the doctors instructions_ after four weeks of diarrhea I started having  severe rectum pain_ I was not able to move without hurting.  I could not urine without my rectum hurting. I continued to take avara not realizing that it was the cause of my pain.   After a month and one day_ I stopped taking avara and my diarrhea stopped but_ I still continued with severe  rectum pain_ I made an appointment with a Rectum specialist and two months later I was diagnosed  with a fissure.  A fissure is caused by repeated episodes of diarrhea_  I ended up having surgery. One month after surgery I am still in pain and I have to wait until my appointment next month_ Oct 2011 to see what else can be done.  I would have rather put up with the pain and suffering of RA t
Comments: If you develop diarrhea don't let it go to far.  Stop taking Arava.

Side Effects: Psoriasis flairing_ no help with PSA
Comments: I have Psoriatic Arthritis and Psoriasis...my psoriasis is 100 x worse than when I started this drug and my arthritis is not getting bette...not to mention the bronchitis and asthma that has only started in the last two weeks! This drug sucks

Side Effects: My brother was taking this and it killed him.
Comments: Don't take this_ it is highly toxic and very dangerous. Look at natural remedies instead_ they may take a little longer to work but they'll fix the problem rather than mask your symptoms

Side Effects: Enlarged Heart_ Fluid around lungs and Heart_ Loss of Hair and Eye Lashes_ Severe Indigestion
Comments: Taken with Methotrexate. Would never take either of these drugs again even though Arthritis symptoms were a lot less. Far too many side effects.

Side Effects: nausea_ headache_ diarrhea_ metallic taste_ loss of smell and taste
Comments: Within a few days of using this drug_ I noticed a headache_ nausea and severe abdominal problems.  I started taking the drug at night and the nausea and headache stopped_ I guess because I was sleeping!  The diarrhea continues_ but much less severe now.  I have recently begun having a metallic taste in my mouth and have lost my sense of smell and taste.  This is pretty annoying.  I was wondering what was causing this so I happened upon this website.  I hadn't associated it with the Arava until I read this_ so I will be talking with my MD.  I am taking the Arava along with 5 mg of prednisone and have found a ton of relief!  I wonder_ though_ if it's from the prednisone_ because I had to get a steroid injection every 3 months prior to starting the prednisone.  I really need to get mroe proactive about my care since I was diagnosed with Sjogren's Syndrome and RA about 10 years ago and i've just been going with the flow and doing whatever the MD tells me.  I am fortunate that I have never had any thinning of hair or rash_ either with the MX or with the Arava.

Side Effects: diarrhea_red spots on chest_ hair loss_ muscle pain_  and just now after 10 yrs_ elevated ALT and AST(2x the norm)_ stopped taking due to ALT 84 _now rash on arms and legs (symmetrically) that really doesn't itch_ top lip numb. Why now??? Anyone know??? Please help.
Comments: Arava did help a little but I still had lots of pain. I knew when a storm was coming 1 day in advance. Taking 5 mgs of prednisone.I stopped taking the Arava 12-31-10 _ and oh god I feel better than ever?? I don't know why. My doc prescribed the questran to get it out because of the rash and elevated liver enzymes. I hope this works.. I just hope this rash isn't serious. I am going to see my p.c.p. tomorrow and talk to a dermatologist to see what going on. I don't think this medicine is as good as it seems. I even contacted Arava makers and they didn't know what to tell me... UGHHH!!!

Side Effects: rashes_ high BP
Comments: I have found natural solutions; please provide your actual e-mail address and not just your acronym if you want answers. many of you are suffering for nothing.

Side Effects: Mouth sores that lasted forever_ itchy red bumps (looked like bites) on face_ neck and chest.  Finally rash spread all over arms and my doctor discontinued Arava and all is now healing.

Do have few s/e itching skin_ and tingling occasionally. I am concerned about liver damage_ but almost died with pneumonia while taking MTX_ before I went to Arava. Don't know what elseto take in its place. I do have alot more mobility_ do have somefatigue and very few flare ups. So far blood tests have been OK.
Almost immediate headache_ ringing in the ears_ blurry vision_ racing heartbeat_ increased sweating_ irritability.
Comments: I am on so much medication that it was hard to identify which one was causing these awful side effects.  Finally_ I was able to identify it by the process of elimination.  I thought for sure it was the Plaquinil because of the blurry vision_ but I guess not. I'm sure the Plaquinil is causing many of the other issues & that I will have to stop taking it as well.  That leaves Methotrexate & Enbrel.  Am hoping for some relief with these two.

Side Effects: Extreme fatigue_ blisters in the mouth.
Comments: I have found the joints are still swollen and stiff with new joints becoming affected.  The fatigue is extreme and I am now wondering if this is the drug for me or not?

Side Effects: Arava helped for five years_ though frequent diarrhea_ some hair loss_ fatigue and dry skin.  Now diarrhea got so violent that social life became intolerable.  Off the drug for two months now but no easing up.  Still think it's the Arava_ but my physician doubts that - i doubt my physician.

First side effect was diarrhea_ but it wasn't too bad.  The bottoms of my feet were very itchy and felt "hot".  Then came the tingling feet and legs which kept me up at night. After about three months of taking Arava I noticed hair loss.  This is what concerns me the most now. I've had some weight loss which is a side effect that I welcome!
Comments: Arava started working in about two weeks in helping with joint pain in my feet_ ankles and knees. It did not help with joint pain in my wrist_ which actually got worse.  After four months my doctor added Enbrel to my treatment along with 2 mg of Prednisone_ which helped with the wrist pain.  Hair loss got worse so I am off Arava now. Dr. didn't think I needed to take cholestyramine to get arava out of my system since I was on it for only four months.  But it stays in your system for up to two years!  I can't keep losing my hair for that long...won't have any left. I'm calling the doctor again next week and ask again about taking cholestyramine.

Side Effects: Now that I think about it_ I believe Arava is causing diarrhea.  At first I thought it was a change to a vegan diet.  Also_ itching along my spine and back_ and very dry skin.
Comments: Am seriously considering stopping this drug.  Also take Prednisone 3 mg per day.  When I decreased prednisone to 2 mg per day for 4 days_ felt awful_ so it seems Arava is doing nothing.  Dr. wants me to try MTX  next; have serious reservations.  Would prefer proven natural cure.

Side Effects: Very bad hair loss after 4 months of taking and continues to fall out after quitting Arava.  Did not help RA symptoms
Accute tiredness_ mouth ulcers_aching bones all over body_burning feet_sores that won't heal_diarrhoea_half an hour after eating passing mucus out of bowel every hour for at least three hours
Comments: would not advise anyone to take it

Side Effects: No side effects. Take with MTX.  Tried MTX w/o Arava and it doesn't work.  Blood labs are fine.  Guess I'm lucky.
At 20 mg initial dose experienced hair loss.  Went down to 10 mg daily and no hair loss.
Comments: No other side effects and blood work every 2 months was normal.  Almost complete remission for 10 years with just occasional flares.  Last Nov. it began to lose its effectivness.

Side Effects: Diarrhea_ some tingling hands/feet_ some stomach cramps_ high liver blood results_ much fatigue_ short breathed_ dizziness
Comments: Started on 20mg/day_ now down to 10mg/2nd-day. Am getting constant bad test results (although not usually extreme) with my liver_ one time I had to stop taking for 1 week to bring liver blood tests down. Swelling has decreased and pain is less_ however still very stiff and extra joints continue to flair. The diarrhea was bad at the start but after reducing dose has settled. I am in 2 minds as to whether this has been a good experience but when I think about how I was and where I was going_ I suppose it has helped. I do not think I will be able to continue with my liver results_ wait and see. I hear that the next stronger meds have even worse side effects.

Side Effects: loss of appetite_ weight loss_ fatigue_ nausea and other flu-like symptoms.  Off of it now.  Made lung disease progress faster
Heart pulpitations_ poor circulation.
Comments: This is the best medicine I have tried so far. After taking several different medications within a twelve year period. The RA has not stoped totally but definately feel the difference. Not as much pain and stiffness_ or side effects.

Side Effects: Headaches_ loss of taste_ itching around ankles and waist_ mild stomach cramps.
Comments: I'm taking the generic version 20 mg daily and 5mg Prenisone daily along with Enbrel 50mg once a week. Diagnosed with PsA 3 years ago. Initially put on MTX and increased to 20mg weekly but it stopped working. Until I started Enbrel about a year ago_ pain and swelling throughout my body had made me almost cripple but I still had to work fulltime. I will reach the lifetime maximum insurance coverage of $15_000 for Enbrel very soon so doctor has started me on Arava in hopes that it will work as well as Enbrel. If it doesn't_ I'm probably screwed until I reach Medicare age unless new affordable drugs come to market.

Side Effects: Loss of libido.  Very red_ itchy rash on sides of thumbs and wrists_ where the bone is close to the skin.
Comments: As I cut down on my dosage_ the rash started to subside.  The doctor was not familiar with this side effect_ but told me to discontinue for the time being.

Side Effects: itchy skin on my limbs. Has left dark scars. hair loss - chunks of hair coming out. Have been on Arava for 5 months. Occasional diarrhea.
Comments: Some weight loss_ I decreased dosage from 10mg every day to 10mg monday to friday. Still the same side effects although the itchiness has marginally decreased.  I am going to stop ARAVA and try an Ayurvedic treatment in India.

Side Effects: had diarrhoea after about 4 weeks on 20 mg per day_ reduced to 10mg and helped a bit_ not so bad now in the morning. MTX on its own stopped working.
Comments: Took it with 7.5 mg MTX &  had to add plaquenil & take MTX to 10mg and only have occasional flare up. Worth the symptoms not to have pain jumping from joint to joint every couple of days not to mention the damage that occurs with every flare up.

Side Effects: Dizziness_ numbness of toes_ reduced blood circulation to toes_ muscle cramps at night_ blurred vision_ anxiety attacks_ loss of appetite_ severe hair loss_ depression_ low blood sugar
Comments: Have had RA for 26 years. Arava helped for the RA inflamation and reduced swelling and pain remarkably well.Are going to stop taking Arava since adding diabetes_ hair and sight loss to the RA symptoms seems to be worst case rather than helpful.

Side Effects: itchy skin all over but mainly around the sides of my face_ neck and scalp. fatigue? not sure if its the RA or arava
Comments: I was pretty bad before taking arava experiencing intense pain from my skull to the soles of my feet. Even cartilage (nose_ ears) and muscle was sore. first tried plaquenil with no success_ then steroids with excellent results on the highest dose but did not want to continue due to possible long term side effects. mtx was a failure due to extreme nausea and fatigue. arava came next and it is working great for me at the moment with only occasional stiffness and soreness although they do seem to be increasing of late.

Side Effects: Extreme fatigue_ racing heart_ stomach cramps_ headache and loss of appetite
Comments: I was on methotraxate for 15 months and I experienced extreme nausea (25mg)_ so my doctor switched me to Arava(20mg). I've been on Arava for about a week now_ so it's too soon to tell if it helps for my RA. I'm not nauseus anymore_ but I'm very_ very tired.

Side Effects: hair loss_ itchy scalp_ weight loss
Comments: I found Arava helpful_ but not as good as Humira at controlling_ but the hair loss is intolerable_ I'm going off it.

Side Effects: After taking this drug for several months I became violently ill. I ended up hospitalized for a MONTH and missed TWO MONTHS of work. Aditionally it seemed to have zero impact on my RA.
Comments: DO NOT TAKE THIS DRUG!!!!!!!

Side Effects: Itching esp on my scalp_itching on limbs_ feels like bites_some nausea_slightly elevated LFT_ tingling of my hands and feet_ occ. fatigue_diarrhea depending on what I eat_ seems to have slowed down tho. Got my menstrual cycle again after 2 yrs.
Comments: RA for 11 yrs with Feltys Syndrome. It has helped me almost more and quicker than MTX did. Have dropped to 7.5 mg Prednisone only for my Feltys to keep my white count up_ otherwise I'm sure I'd be off it.I would rather have the annoying side effects I have and be able to get up and go to work_ then not be able to move at all and lose my job again. So_ its a thumbs up for me.

Side Effects: I am just beginning to notice some itchy spots at places where the bone is close to the skin and am wondering if this might be a side effect of the drug. I have not experienced any other side effects.
Comments: I am taking this drug along with Enbrel_ and have noticed a decrease fatigue and flu-like symptoms since the doctor added  leflunomide to my cocktail.

Side Effects: gastro only_ but had problems before taking Arava.  Monthly lab work clean  Psoriasis symptoms gone.
Comments: I couldn't put my weight on my left leg due to psoriatic arthritis in knee.  Within days_ I was able to do so.  After 3 years_ I am 90% free of pain and discomfort.  Sometimes better.  What I do still notice is manageable_ but I do miss curling my leg up in the chair before sitting - just can't bend the knee comfortably that far!

Side Effects: worse experience ever...now no hair_ can't sleep_ rash all over my body. Now have psorisis on my face(never had before). Shocking experience. 20mgs with MTX and remicade.

Tingling in my hands_ intermitent diarrhea and today I am being sent to hospital by my local doctor for a CAT scan of my abdomen as she believes I have now developed a stomach ulcer. This meidication has treated my arthritis very well_ but the side affects are terrible. My stomach gets upset every time I take the tablet (20mg). I am considering coming off the medication.
Comments: My Arthritis is aweful_ but I am wondering if the side affects of this drug is worth it.

Side Effects: Upset stomach_ only slight relief of pain and high liver numbers_ so i had to go off.
Comments: What i would like to know is if I'm suffering from "withdrawal_" feeling flu-like symptoms after four days off_ or if I've got N1H1. Can't get the doc to answer that.

Side Effects: extreme fatigue_ racing/pounding heart_ elevated heart rate
Comments: I have only been on for 8 days and I am hoping that these side effects subside. I will call MD re the pounding and elevated heart rate which is not constant. So far_ no noticeable relief.

Side Effects: Stomach Pain
Comments: I have not taken for 4 days due to bad stomach pain. I don't think I have any other side effects.  I will restart tomorrow.  If the pain reoccurs_ I will tell Doctor at my next visit.

Side Effects: I have been on Arava for 2 months this time_ the first time I took it was 2 years ago_ I got so sick I lost alot of weight and my hair became very thin.....I decided to try it again after having reaction to humara and MTX no help...I started on 10mg a day _ slight diarrhea and hair loss_ then I increased to 20mg_ I still had the hair loss and stomach upset_ but by the end of the second month I had developed a horrible itchy rash_ I bruised my skin scratching it is so bad_ I am still trying to get rid of the rash...
Comments: The Arava did seem to help the RA_ however the rash is sooo itching I can't stand it and I guess will be back at square one yet again

Side Effects: Have only been taking for 2 days.  I have stomach pain about an hour after I take this_ it lasts for about 4 hours.
Comments: I tried MTX for 5 weeks got mouth sores_ roof of my mouth felt burnt_ hair loss.  Also on Plaquenil and Celebrex.

Side Effects: moderate almost daily headaches_ loose stools- but not to the point of diarrhea (Neither od these side effects aew worse than the extrme joint pain I was experiencing-so I am staying on Arava)
Comments: Diagnosed with Lupus 2 years ago- Initially on Plaquenil and metotrexate- Methotrexate made very nauseous to the point of vomiting two days a week- Switched to 10 mg Avara in combination with the Plaquenil- Good results within a month- Able to walk MILES with no pain! I truly feel like my life has been given back to me and hope the success (and minimal side effects) continue!

Side Effects: headache_ extreme stomach cramping_ sore joints and muscles_ alot of pain in my kidney area_ itchy skin and extreme fatigue and nausea.  They all take turns.
Comments: I am currently taking plaquenil and methotrexate. Spurs are continuiing to form on fingers and hands. Arava has been introduced to try and slow down progression of disease. Only been on the drug for 10 days.  Did not take todays dose.  And will be making a decision on whether to persevere after a visit to my GP. I think not. any advice???

Side Effects: So far_ the only side effect I have noticed (and I have been taking it for two weeks now) have been mouth sores & now a whopping case of oral thrush.  I had to go to the urgent care last night because my tongue was so sore I couldn't eat or drink and I had a thick creamy white patch on my tongue that was growing by leaps and bounds.  The doctor at the urgent care stated I shouldn't have waited as long to come in.
Comments: I have been on MTX since 2005_ both pills & shots and would get so debilitated that I can no longer work. My arthritis got bad in my legs and knees_ elbows that my 12 hour shift work as a nurse was totally out of the question. The MTX caused severe nausea_ vomiting and diarrhea that I would be in bed for a few days and afraid to venture out of the house. I went to my new rheumy in tears and he switched me to Arava.  After two weeks_ I've noticed great improvement in my mobility that I am hoping to return to work soon.  Now_ just to get rid of the thrush!!!!

Side Effects: My doctor initially started me on 20mg_ but the main side effect that was severe and most noticeable was the diarrhea.  She then put me on 10mg.  It helped_ but not as much as when on 20mg.  I started taking the 20mg at night before going to sleep and the diarrhea is not bad.  Now I will go about twice in the morning and maybe once or twice throughout the day.  Depending on what and how much I eat.  Whereas before I remember once going to the restroom about 6 times in one day with diarrhea.  I have experienced other side effects such as_ hair loss_ brittle nails_ headaches_ tingling of hands and feet_ skin tenderness_ mouth sores/tenderness_ frequent need to go urinate_ heart racing_ shortness of breath_ nausea_ occasional dizziness and some weight loss (not much though).
Comments: I have been on remicade for about 3 - 4 years.  I am also on mobic and folic acid.  My doctor has also advised me to take two calcium with vitamin D pills a day.  I am also taking multi vitamins.  In the past I have been on prednisone and methatrexate and neither one of these helped like Arava has.  I use to experience frequent flares all over_ but mainly in my knees and ankles.  I have not had a flare since being on Arava.  I have been on Arava for about 7 months - 1 year.  I could not go up or down stairs without feeling severe pain and could not move legs to go up or down at the same time.  Now my legs can move simultaneously to go up or down.  This is the only drug that has helped me a lot.  The pain is not severe anymore and I definitely have more mobility.  My joints are not as tender anymore.

Side Effects: Some hair loss in the first few months_ bone pain_ fatigue_ mouth tissues swollen and tender_ decrease in Vit D levels.  Occ flares of rheumatoid nodules on hands and feet.  Have learned not to try to over-do physically and the flares go away in 1-2 days.
Comments: I have taken Arava 10 mg per day with Mtx for about a year and the early side effects have all but gone away.  Occ fatigue spells_ must get extra rest for a day or two then am better.  Mouth tissues still tender and burning but generally better all around.  Taking add'l Vit D with Calcium.  Labs are getting better and MD orders liver function studies every other month.  I take 1/2 pain pill at night to keep night pain under control so I can get some steady hours of sleep.  I've had RA for 10 years and have tried many of the other drugs like Remicade.  I either had to stop because my insurance failed to pay or the drugs didn't seem to work for me.  I still have constant pain but I can manage it for now with Arava.

Side Effects: Extremely brittle nails; some hair loss;occasional mouth sores; intermittent skin tenderness; dizzyness - not sure how many of these are attributed to Arava.
Comments: Has worked wonders for me in conjunction with MTX; great improvement when added to MTX 2 years ago. 20mg x5 days/week. Would love to come off the drugs_ but after reading all the other comments_ think it best to stay on as dont want to have all that pain again. Still have some pain but can live with it. Think I'm one of the lucky ones with not too bad s/e.

Side Effects: adverse reaction in combination with any NSAID - racing heart_ panicky sensation_ unable to focus and concentrate_ unable to sleep.
Comments: besides being ineffective in treating my symptoms_ this drug caused dangerous interactions for me - taking it with even small (1/4 to 1/5 pill) doses of voltaren_ aleve or any other NSAID caused extremely elevated heart beat and pronounced panicky sensation. I went to the ER because of this drug_ before i figured out what was happening. I would give it a minus rating if it were available here. If I had taken what my doctor had prescribed_ which was 20 mg arava along with two Aleves twice a day_ I'd probably be dead of a heart attack by now.

Side Effects: diaroheae mainly at night
Comments: pain in joints reduced sometimes to zero. Periodic flare up easily controlled by steroid injections.

Side Effects: racing heart_ diarrhea_frequent urination_frequent pulmonary infections.
Comments: i am unable to take other ra drugs as i had a severe reaction to remicade. hopefully these problems will work themselves out. not too many rx options for me.

Side Effects: started on 20mg but got severe side effects_hair loss_diarrohea_headaches_tingling of hands aand feet_severe weight loss_.have been on the drug now for 2 years at the lower dose of 10mg and find the weight loss has stabilised_small hair loss_tingling of the hands and feet_poor appettite_always tired and hard too get to sleep_but has helped wonderfully and is worth enduring with the side effects as quality of life has improved and the pain is tolerable
Comments: Have severe R/A_Hashimotos thryoiditis_ankolysing spondilitis_uvetis. I'am also on mxt 7.5mg_prednisolone 5mg_plaquenil 400mg and opium patches for pain

Side Effects: fatigue_ heart racing
Comments: Not much relief yet.  also on predisone....down from 10mg to 8 and trying to get off of it......weight gain.  i think the racing heart is more due to predisone than arava_ but not sure.  I'm a recently diagnosed RA patient and I do not know how you others have lived with this kind of pain for so long.  some days i wake up in screaming pain; other days are tolerable.  how do you live with this?

Side Effects: Intermittent fatigue_ low B/P when arising in morning_ typically 70/40_ frequent nightly urination - 4/6 times_ appetite loss_ short of breath after minor exertion
Comments: Diagnosed with RA 30 yrs ago.  Naproxyn_plaquenil not effective with increased symptoms in last few months.  MTX side effects were similar_ but spontaneous infections/pain put me in the E/R 3 times (admitted once for elevated WBC).  Opted off MTX as quality of life was poor due to fatigue - sleeping 16 hrs/day & force feeding to keep weight up.Have been taking Arava every other day for 16 days.  Was to start one/day yesterday_ but due to side effects_ will continue every other day & notify doc.

Side Effects: extremely tired_ loss of apetite and losing weight which I really can't affort.
Comments: I've had juvenile onset ra_ basicly all my life. This is probably one of the most horible drugs I've taken after methotraxate. So I won't be staying on this drug much longer!

Side Effects: Severe hair loss_ diarrohea_ tingling sensation in hands and feet_brittle nails_ very dry eyes
Comments: appears to control inflamation of joints but the side effects are worrying and getting worse. am also on Plasmaquin_ prednisone_ folic acid _ omega oils -B complex. surely there is a more natural way to treat this condition?

Side Effects: Hair loss_ diarrhea
Hair Loss_ Numbness and tingling in hands & arms_ loose stools_ frequent urination
Comments: Have been taking for 12 weeks now_ symptoms started about 4 weeks ago gradually have become more noticable.  A bit vague at first but convinced now it is due to this drug.  I am also on methotrexate 20mg and prednisone 7.5mg.   The hair falling out is a little worring_ I am wondering if it will stop before I am bald!! The loose stools_ not quite bad enough to stop the drug.  The numbness and tingling in my hands and arms is driving me mad_ keeping me awake and they ache all night long_  during the day it feels like I have lead weights attached to my arms and if they are hanging down or I hold them up they ache.  Also think this drug may be causing me to urinate frequently feels like I have the start of a urinary tract infection_ but have been checked out nothing.  Has anyone had these symptoms and continued the medication with success_ i.e. the symptoms have decreased?   My GP has told me to stop it as my rhuemy is away on vacation for a month_ so I don't know what to do.

Side Effects: Hair loss
Comments: Did nothing for my RA_ hair dried out and got quite thin (I was 22 at the time). 2yrs later my hair is no better.

Side Effects: 1st took arava a couple of years ago after failing mtx_remicade. Worked ok_ then great with enbril. Went off all med's for 18 mo's (yeah)_ just starting with Arava again. Having stomach cramps_ gas and diarrhea. RA symptoms decreased after about 3 wks.
I do get diarrhoea with this drug especially if I eat wheat.  My hair became very thin.
Comments: When I first started taking Arava it gave me a new zest of life. Especially less fatigue. I came off Arava when I started taking Humira early in the year when I experienced a nasty flare. Not a good idea!!! So now back on Arava again. Flare has worsen and currently taking Enbrel too. Hope this goes well.I also take Methotrexate and Mobic. Good luck!

Side Effects: came off arava for 5 weeks on methotrexate which was useless all symptoms returned now back on arava no side effects brilliant medication now on 20mg arava per day 15mg methotrexate weekly feel like a new person
Comments: very expensive but the best

Side Effects: Very bad diarreah that persisted for several months though lessened slightly as went forward.  Bouts of intense itching.  Finally utter sleeplessness night after night.  This made me get off the drug as it was intolerable.
Paresthesias of the hands. Hair loss_ heart palpitations_ high blood pressure_ diarrhea_ off balance_ feel like I'm going to fall over.
Comments: Have now come off this drug as I was told this was the cause of my hand paresthesias after already having carpel tunnel surgery.

Side Effects: Same symptoms as STEVENS JOHNSON SYNDROME..ALMOST DIED!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Comments: Stay away from this drug!!!!!!

Side Effects: Mtx not working too well after 22 years of great success. Added 10mg Arava daily and have lowered my prednisone to 2mg from 5mg.
Comments: Only been on the Arava for a month but in the past week i have been extremely tired. Start yawning at noon and go to bed at 7.30pm instead of the usual 10pm. Has anyone had this problem as i'm not sure if it's related to the Arava? No other side effects so far.

Side Effects: Metallic taste leading to loss of appetite.  Also have unexplained bouts of diarhea which are infrequent enough now to not cause me to stop taking it.  I was on mtx and it made me so sick that I would lose at least a day of work a week and be laid up with fatigue
Comments: Right now side effects are not that bad that I will stop taking it.  Accupuncture seems to help restore some of my taste for brief periods of time.

Side Effects: Diarrhoea every so often_ stomach cramps_ frequent urinating_ rash on legs and arms that itches more at night or when i'm hot_ tiredness(not sure if its related_ i'm always tired?)_ bleeding gums
Comments: Had RA for 8 years_ pretty good on meds_ been on mtx for years and its great_ celebrex was okay but stopped working. Been on Arava for a while now_ about 8 months and had a few liver problems but after stopping all my medication (was very interesting) for 2 months and going back onto MTX and Arava all problems ceased. Went off celebrex  as it didnt seem to be doing much_ also tried Prednisone but had horrible side effects_ Extreme headaches everyday_ yellowing of skin and eyes. Actually thought diarrhoea and stomach cramps was caused by dairy intolerance so stopped dairy but now might go back on as it seems Arava could be my problem. Had bleeding gums lately_ not sure if thats related but cant explain it otherwise. Any questions or just wanna talk about RA e-mail me.

Side Effects: Diarrhoea at the beginning and itchiness resembling scabies. Also SGOT and SGPT were elevated. After decreasing the dose from 20 to 10 mg per day side effects dissapeared.
Comments: Have been taking it for 14 months now combined with Plaquenil and Cortisone. The symptoms of the disease vanished. Still have trouble waking up and gained weight mainly due to cortisone i presume.

Side Effects: unpredictable diarrhea is the most bothersome side efect.Non-itchy rash on legs.
Comments: Came off it briefly (3 Months) and was soon experiencing swelling fingers_ morning stiffness_ joint pain.

Side Effects: WEIGHT LOSS KEEPS ME AWAKE EVEN THOUGH EXHAUSTED
Comments: WORRIED ABOUT HAIR LOSSI TAKE 20MG A DAY SEVEN DAYS A WEEKBRILLIANT MEDICATION

Side Effects: the itching has just begun. driving me nuts. had eczema as a child. over that but boy is this bringing back the horrors. does a cortisone or anti itch cream work? anyone try. i'm off to the drugstore now.
Comments: other than that love the drug. took initially for one year_ had all the weight loss_ but somehow found it back. hair loss was freaky at first_ but rogain helped that. stopped taking the drug for other reasons. off for two years_ back on again for about 2 years now.

Side Effects: None.  Can't tell I'm taking it which is great.  Replaced MTX which stopped working.
Explosive diarrhea and intestinal cramping. No other side effects.

I have noticed dry skin_ and started loosing weight.  Have lost 40+ pounds_ not complaining though. (Possible weight loss product?!!)  When I first started_ diahrea_ then just loose stools after the first couple of months.  Has relieved my RA pain and stiffness_ so I give it a high-five.

I have noticed dry skin_ and started loosing weight.  Have lost 40+ pounds_ not complaining though. (Possible weight loss product?!!)  When I first started_ Diarrhea_ then just loose stools after the first couple of months.  Has relieved my RA pain and stiffness_ so I give it a high-five.
On first taking it I did experience some stomach pain so my Dr. lowered dosage to 3x a week.Now I have no side effects and minimal joint pain.
Severe stomach cramps. Dizziness. Dry hair. Blurred vision.
Comments: Methotrexate quit working for me.  Was on Humira_ but developed heart problems.  Has eased my flares somwwhat.  Have had RA for 25 years.

Side Effects: extreme nausea.  Vomiting.  Dizziness.  Headaches.  Hair Loss. Fatigue.  Diarrhea. Not able to sleep.
Comments: I was taking plaqunil and it didn't seem to work.  Still have pain and swelling only now I'm nauseous all the time.  I haven't been on it that long hoping things get better.

Side Effects: Very long and heavy menstraul cycles going far past 2-3 weeks long_ breathing asthma problems with heart palpatations.  Bowel problems as well.
Comments: It never helped from the start_ they said to give it time and when I did_ all it did was make me horribly sick.  Oddly enough_ my liver stayed fine even though it was the side effect they worried about.

Side Effects: During the morning and evening_ I have extreme itching all over my body.  My periods have lasted longer and are much heavier.
Comments: Arava has helped so much_ I don't even feel like I have arthritis anymore.  I started to see results after 6 weeks of taking it_ and since then_ I have not needed to take any Aleve_ I am mostly pain free.

Side Effects: Took Arava for 6 months.  Extreme hair loss.Had a mamogram & discovered early stages breast cancer. Am now off drug.
Comments: Did the immune suppresant cause the breast cancer??

Side Effects: Been on Arava for 1 month and experiencing itchiness_ a rash that looks and feels like bites. Also diarreah.  Not fun
Comments: I was diagnosed with RA over 2 years ago. i have tried various drugs_ including methotrexate and varoius anti-inflammatories. Everything has had side effects from extreme fatigue to heart palpatations_ shakiness_ blood pressure risen. I'm wondering if the disease doesn't get you the cure will.  Would like a friend to talk to about this disease. People who haven't expierenced the pain and stiffness cannot relate.

Side Effects: diarrhea; often wakes me up in the night; feel kind of dizzy and disconnected sometimes and wonder if it is the Arava (I take 20 mg per day); anyone else have that disconnected feeling?
Comments: also take Enbrel - 50 mg per week; the combo seems pretty good; billirubin has been high_ but they did lots ot tests and all is O.K.

Side Effects: abdominal rash that gets worse daily
Comments: This is the first DMARD I have had a fairly complete response to.  The swelling in my feet and ankles is down by 2/3 and the daily pain and stiffness is minimal now.  I am finally able to finish tapering the prednisone.  I worried about hairloss and diarreah_ but so far_ so good.  Just the rash.  Has anyone ever scratched to death????  Still_ I'd rather itch than hurt like I did.

Side Effects: Been on Arava off and on for over six years. Side effects were the usual_ hair loss and hair dryness_ nailbed problems_ gastro problems_ but the main problem was and remains vertigo and loss of balance.  When I go off Arava I never trip over my own two feet_ but on Arava I loss my balance and fall once or twice a week_ have a tough time with uneven pavement or stairs.  Has reduced frequency and duration of flares but I'm still wondering if the side effects are worth the moderate relief.  Sort of stuck here_ though_ can't take Enbrel (dangerously elevated my liver enzymes) or MTX_ am running out of options.
None at all. Possibly because of my age or possibly due to a stomach made of iron.

Extreme hair loss after less that one week. Stomach cramps are debilitating at times_ along with intermittent loose stools. I want OFF of this medication but doc says I need it to fight the Polyoma virus that's struck my new kidney.
Comments: This particular use of this drug is off-label.

Side Effects: Extreme hair loss_ gallbladder/liver pain_ diarrhea_ nausea
Comments: I've only been on ARAVA for 4 months.  Initially it worked great_ but the last month it seems to have become toxic in my system.  I've lost 1/2 of my hair mass and it continues to fall out.  The stomach cramping and diarrhea are fairly moderate.  I stopped taking ARAVA this morning and have made an appointment with a homeopathic doctor.  Previosuly on methotrexate for 2 years until severe side effects occured.  I'm so over putting this poison in my body.

Side Effects: Initial scary hair loss so stopped the drug.  Approx 1 yr later_ started again at 10mg: now minimal hair loss_ minimal inflammation_ running again after 5 yrs of no running. Also on 20mg metho_ 100g celebrex (prn)
Comments: Haven't had a period for 10 weeks- not sure if it is related

Side Effects: diarrhea_ after three weeks_ afraid to eat out_ in the bathroom a short time after eating_ after being off it for 4 weeks i still have cramping_ diahhrea and weight loss.  red spots on chest and waistline.
Comments: it's a horrible drug

Side Effects: Intense taste perversion (constant metallic taste)_ headaches_ rash
Comments: Took 10mg/day for 3 months and had to quit because headaches and bad taste became intolerable. Experimented with dose for several months_ and now take 10mg for two days_ then a day off_ then back on for two days_etc.  This seems to be minimizing symptoms_ while still providing joint relief.  I'm also on methotrexate 20mg/week_ prednisone (5mg/day) and relafen.

Side Effects: Arava helped me a great deal. The side effects that I experienced were mouth sores and hair loss. Once I discovered the mouth sores I would simply skip a does and the mouth sores would go away. My hair has gotten thinner but not so thin to the point where I would rather stop the Arava and continue with pain. It has helped me alot in my case.
rash on my hands_ mouth sores/thrush (can't even eat spicy foods) some diarrhea off and on_
Comments: Overall I feel like Arava has helped by general stiffness but I am still having flares in various joints off and on so I am not sure the side affects are worth taking the medicine.  Everything I eat hurts my mouth.  I am using a rinse for my mouth but so far it just gives me a numbing relief.. hasn't made it go away.

Side Effects: explosive diarrhea
Comments: I have been taking Arava for 6 months.  I have been feeling great but I am also on Enbrel and have been on Prednisone as well.  I have finally weaned off of the Prednisone as of about 1 month ago.  For the past month I have had increasing bouts of diarrhea with the last week being unbearable.  If I eat at all I can expect to run to the bathroom every 7-10 minutes for about 4 hours.  I am either starving or in the bathroom.  My Rheumy has told me to stop taking it and is giving me something to have it rapidly removed from my system while binding me up.  I will pick it up tomorrow.  I am worried about another drug in its place since I have had no other side effects until now.

Side Effects: none
Comments: I feel soooo good.  Finally I feel like I did before ra.  mtx worked temporarily previously and now I was able to stop that and prednisone!

Side Effects: I started Oct 04 and started to experience diarrhea within 6 weeks or so.  By Feb 05 I was living on Immodium for the daily diarrhea that was starting to wake me up at night.  After a couple of "accidents" I saw a GI doc who could find NO reason for my diarrhea and rapid transit time.  I stopped taking it in June and the diarrhea ceased within a few weeks.  I have not had this problem since stopping this medicine.
Hair loss. rashes that itches like crazy x/1000 chicken poz. I agree.
Comments: Trying to get out of system for a month. Still lossing my hair and still have the rash.

Side Effects: In beginning_ awful diahria. Better now on 10mg.  On for 5 years +.  Beginning to get high blood pressure_ high cholesterol_ anemia_ extreme itching_ after shower or shaving; in arms and legs.
Comments: Would like to know if anyone else has taken this long_ and if they experienced the side effects after long term use?

Side Effects: chronic headache and fatugue_ weight loss
Comments: somehow helped me with lower part of my body (hardly any swelling) but upper half worse than ever.  not sure if it's arava but haven't had to see doctor to remove fluid from my knees for about a year now.  if only it would start helping my upper body..

Side Effects: slight nausea_palpitation and for some weird reason i've had my period for 12 days so far which has never happened b4 so i'm thinking the new medication.
Comments: The Arava seems to be helping a little_my hands don't feel quite so sore and are nowhere near as swollen_but the rest of me still feels the same_maybe i'll try it a little longer and see what happens. Anyone interested in contacting me to swap stories feel free.

Side Effects: EXTREME HAIR LOSS went on arava for 6 wks_ and it did nothing for me_ but within 3 wks after stopping arava(the drug from hell) my hair fell out in clumbs!!! I'm still trying to get it out of my system_(remember all users it
Diarreha_ frequent urination_ extreme rash_ headaches.
Comments: Although the drug did help the RA symptoms_ it has made me very sick. The rash is the worst; extreme itching that keeps me awake and it on my abdomen and legs. The general feeling of weakness and headahes are also very difficult. It's very disappointing since I have had this terrible disease for 50 years. If it's not the RA it's the drugs!

Side Effects: makes me itchy in the upper arms_ nothing serious though
Comments: i have just been put on the drug by my rhemo_ about a month ago_ my swelling much reduced as is the pain in my ankles. seems to help the mtx which i've been on for 2 years. rheumo says there are more good drugs available soon. let's hope so. mail me if you wanna talk symtoms or need somebody who knows what it's like.

Side Effects: When I initially started_ I had no side effects but also did not have any relief. After about a month on Arava_ I started to get loose stools all the time. During the 2nd and 3rd month_ I started getting really bad diarrhoea every 3 or 4 days which would last a long time unless I took tons of Imodium and Ditropan. Then my rheumy doubled my Arava dosage and within a week_ the diarrhoea became scarily horrendous! I also became extremely tired to the point where I had to stay in bed. I also started feeling really weird. She lowered the dosage and doubled my Plaquanil dosage but I still kept getting the diarrhoea although not as badly as on the double dose or Arava. I finally stopped the Arava and she is starting me on Methotrexate and continuing my Plaquanil.
Comments: The Arava probably helped my RA about 20%. My neck and shoulder stiffness got much better although my finger joints were still pretty bad. My ankles are still swollen and my hips hurt all the time. I still had to go on 20 mg Prednizone if I needed to do anything that required some physical activity.

Side Effects: After 1 week of Arava I broke out in a severe rash covering my upper arms_ legs and abdomen. The rash was so itchy I was frantic_ antihistamines did not work. I had to take prednisone to deal with the rash which lasted 1 month. The rash felt like chickenpox x/1000. It made my life hell_ I have also reacted to sulfasalazine and methotrexate.
heart raceing
Bad Diarrhea setting in after 15 months of use. I started taking it because Methotraxate which had worked very well for 10 years had stopped working. I am taking Arava together with Nivaquin.
none realy at the moment but is early days as i have only been taken them for two month after taken methotrextrate for two years which were not agreeing with me_[rash problems]
Frequently urination
In the beginning had a headache similar to dehydration effect. Easily relieved by drinking water and haven't had it since.
Comments: Finally_ a miracle for me. Had RA since 1989. Nothing really worked to put out the

Side Effects: Rashes that I know are related. I can stop Arava and the rash disappears. When I start it again_ the rash comes back ...mostly in the neck and lower leg areas. Works great on RA_ but the publicity scares me.
Diarrhea_ weight loss.
Comments: I have experienced Diarrhea every day since beginning this medicine.  But since it seems to be working_ I am continuing for now.

Side Effects: In the early days_ some hair loss.  At this point_ 2 yrs into the therapy_ hair loss has stopped.  I can not be sure if it is working or not_ I take other RA drugs and this is a companion drug.  I take Enbrel and this is like Methotrextrate_ since I cannot take MXT.
Comments: Easier on me than MXT_ which was real bad.  Doc and I are not sure of if this drug is really working for me or not_ since I take other

Side Effects: Stomach problems every morning after taking them for 3 months.
Comments: I have had problems with my stomach with over drugs for RA so don't let it put you off

Side Effects: nausea_ diarrhea_ frequent urination_ hair loss_ fatigue
DIARRHEA.
Diarrhea
Diarrhea
HAIR LOSS_ HEADACHE_ NAUSEA_ VOMITING_ NAIL DISORDERS_ FREQUENT URINATION
slight hair loss_ fatigue.
Comments: It sufficiently keeps swelling down yet it is easy on my stomach_ although I wish it was a little more powerful.
